metadata.title: CVE-2016-3892 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The Qualcomm SPMI driver in Android before 2016-09-05 on Nexus 5, 5X, 6,and 6P devices allows attackers to obtain sensitive information via acrafted application, aka Android internal bug 28760543 and Qualcomminternal bug CR1024197.

criterions.comment: linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
